sub_fields.label: heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.default_value: Government of Canada Benefits Finder

sub_fields.label: content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.default_value: Answer questions to get a customized list of benefits for which you may be eligible. The Benefits Finder may suggest benefits from federal, provincial or territorial governments, and does not collect or track your information. The more questions you answer, the more customized your results will be.

sub_fields.label: link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.default_value: Click here to start the questionnaire.

sub_fields.label: Home Content
sub_fields.name: home_content
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the information for the home page.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Title of home page i.e. Durham Tax Help.
sub_fields.default_value: Durham Tax Help

sub_fields.label: Statement
sub_fields.name: statement
sub_fields.instructions: Introductory paragraph.
sub_fields.default_value:
It's never too late
to file your taxes! Tax filing can
boost your income, and we can
show you how.

sub_fields.label: Find Help Button
sub_fields.name: find_help_button
sub_fields.instructions: "Find Tax Help" button text
sub_fields.default_value: Find Tax Help

sub_fields.label: Convert Button
sub_fields.name: convert_button
sub_fields.instructions: "Qualify" button text
sub_fields.default_value: Qualify

sub_fields.label: Conversion Messages
sub_fields.name: conversion_messages
sub_fields.instructions: Tell the user what happens whether their income is too high or too low.

sub_fields.label: Begin
sub_fields.name: begin
sub_fields.instructions: Here is where they are warranted to enter their income.
sub_fields.default_value: Enter your income to see if you qualify.

sub_fields.label: Successful
sub_fields.name: successful
sub_fields.instructions: If the users income is withing qualifying standards, send this message.
sub_fields.default_value: Wonderful, you qualify!

sub_fields.label: Failed
sub_fields.name: failed
sub_fields.instructions: If the income entered is too high, send this message to the page.
sub_fields.default_value: Sorry, that income is too high.

sub_fields.label: Invalid
sub_fields.name: invalid
sub_fields.instructions: If the income is not a convertible number then prompt them to enter one.
sub_fields.default_value: Please enter a valid number.

Name of the tax help institute.
example: Ajax Tax & Assistance

example: 1235 Lincwaulf Ave. Ajax, ON

sub_fields.label: Longitude
sub_fields.name: longitude
sub_fields.instructions:
The exact longitude of the institution.

You can find these through finding the address google maps and selecting where the building is placed on the map to find its coordinates.

sub_fields.label: Latitude
sub_fields.name: latitude
sub_fields.instructions:
The exact latitude of the institution.

You can find these through finding the address google maps and selecting where the building is placed on the map to find its coordinates.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: Title for this section
sub_fields.default_value: How To Qualify

sub_fields.label: heading1
sub_fields.name: heading1
sub_fields.default_value: Eligibility Criteria:

sub_fields.label: statement
sub_fields.name: statement
sub_fields.default_value:
People need to be present to have their income tax returns completed. For example, in the case of couples, both partners need to be present, and in the case of any children who are earning an income, those children need to be present.

Each clinic has specific eligibility criteria based upon income level and place of residence. Please review the clinic description carefully.

sub_fields.label: paragraph1_heading
sub_fields.name: paragraph1_heading
sub_fields.default_value: Volunteers cannot help with income tax returns for:

sub_fields.label: paragraph1_content
sub_fields.name: paragraph1_content
sub_fields.default_value:
deceased individuals
bankruptcies
capital gains or losses
employment expenses
business or rental income and expenses

sub_fields.label: paragraph2_heading
sub_fields.name: paragraph2_heading
sub_fields.default_value: The volunteers trained by Canada Revenue Agency follow these guidelines:

sub_fields.label: paragraph2_content
sub_fields.name: paragraph2_content
sub_fields.default_value:
Individual $30,000 or less
    Married or Common-Law couple $40,000 or less
    Single Parent with 1 child $35,000 or less (add $2,500 per additional child)
    Interest income limited to under $1,000

sub_fields.label: paragraph3_heading
sub_fields.name: paragraph3_heading
sub_fields.default_value: The Chartered Accountant volunteers follow these guidelines:

sub_fields.label: paragraph3_content
sub_fields.name: paragraph3_content
sub_fields.default_value: Individual with no dependents $25,000 or less

sub_fields.label: heading2
sub_fields.name: heading2
sub_fields.default_value: What to Bring:

sub_fields.label: content2
sub_fields.name: content2
sub_fields.default_value:
Rent or property taxes paid, where you lived, and the name of your landlord
    Charitable or political donation receipts
    Child care expenses
    Disability Tax Credit Certificate (T2001)
    Interest paid on student loans
    Medical and dental expenses
    RRSP contributions
    Your previous year’s Income Tax Return
    Your previous year’s Notice of Assessment

sub_fields.label: heading3
sub_fields.name: heading3
sub_fields.default_value: What to Bring:

sub_fields.label: content3
sub_fields.name: content3
sub_fields.default_value:
Social Insurance Number (SIN) for you, your spouse, and any dependents such as children.
    List of your dependents' names and dates of birth
    Details of your spouse's income
    Details of your dependent's income
    Direct deposit information for your refund, such as a void cheque
    Anything you think might be needed for your income taxes
    T3 - Statement of Trust Income
    T4 – Statement of Remuneration Paid – received for paid employment
    T4A – Statement of Pension, Retirement, Annuity, and Other Income
    T4(OAS) – Old Age Security
    T4A(P) – Canada Pension
    T4RSP – Registered Retirement Savings
    T4RIFT4U – Income from Retirement Savings
    T5 – Statement of Investment Income
    T5007 – Statement of Benefits
    RC62 – Universal child care benefit statement
    PT5007 (statement of benefits)

sub_fields.name: button1
sub_fields.default_value: Am I Eligible?

sub_fields.label: button2
sub_fields.name: button2
sub_fields.default_value: Receipts

sub_fields.label: button3
sub_fields.name: button3
sub_fields.default_value: Information Slips

sub_fields.label: Main Title
sub_fields.name: main_title
sub_fields.default_value: Be a Volunteer!

sub_fields.label: Title 1
sub_fields.name: title_1
sub_fields.default_value: How to become a volunteer

sub_fields.label: Content 1
sub_fields.name: content_1
sub_fields.default_value: To volunteer at a free tax clinic, you must be affiliated with a community organization that participates in the Community Volunteer Income Tax Program (CVITP). To find one of these organizations in the Durham region, click the button below.

sub_fields.label: VideoVideo
sub_fields.name: videovideo
sub_fields.instructions: Place your video link here

sub_fields.label: Video Description
sub_fields.name: video_description
sub_fields.default_value: In the video above, Samantha gives more details on the Volunteer process.

sub_fields.label: Title 2
sub_fields.name: title_2
sub_fields.default_value: How to run a tax clinic

sub_fields.label: Content 2
sub_fields.name: content_2
sub_fields.default_value: The Community Volunteer Income Tax Program (CVITP) enables community organizations to run free tax clinics in their local communities. As a community organization, you register with the CRA, and the CRA provides resources to help you run your tax clinic. Your business will help members in your community access benefits and credits they are entitled to. To get started or to learn more,
